column4: US imposes initial 10% tariff on all imports from China under IEEPA
End of 30-day pause; US imposes 25% tariff on all imports from Mexico, Canada (10% on energy from Canada)
US increases tariffs on China from 10% to 20%
Section 232 tariffs (25% steel / 10% aluminum) go into effect globally
Section 232 tariffs of 25% on automobiles go into effect globally
Universal 10% IEEPA tariff applied to imports from nearly all countries
China imposes massive counter-tariffs bringing total rate to 125%
China tariffs reset to 10% following US-China negotiation progress
US increases Steel/Aluminum tariffs to 50% (UK exempted)
Vietnam agrees to fixed 20% tariff rate via trade deal
Indonesia agrees to fixed 19% tariff rate via trade deal
South Korea agrees to fixed 15% tariff rate via trade deal
US imposes additional 40% tariff on Brazil (Total effective rate ~50%)
US imposes additional 25% tariff on India for purchasing Russian oil
